    • Method Detail

      • authenticateUser

        public static User authenticateUser(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
                             throws ModelException
        Authenticates the user against the existing database
        Parameters:
        username - The username to authenticate
        password - The password to authenticate
        Returns:
        The corresponding user if the authentication was successful
        Throws:
        ModelException - if an error occurs with the database

      • addUser

        public static void addUser(User usr)
                    throws ModelException
        Adds a user to the database
        Parameters:
        usr - The user to add into the database
        Throws:
        ModelException - if an error happens with the database

      • updateUser

        public static void updateUser(User usr)
                       throws ModelException
        Updates the database to reflect the changes made to the user object passed into the function
        Parameters:
        usr - The user to update, with the new data already in the user object
        Throws:
        ModelException - if the user specified does not exist, or if an error occurs with the database

      • deleteUser

        public static void deleteUser(User usr)
                       throws ModelException
        Deletes the specified user from the database
        Parameters:
        usr - The user to delete from the database
        Throws:
        ModelException - if the user specified does not exist, or if an error occurs with the database
